message:
Hi, I want to download attached files in this website for decrypting DMM Books DRM.
https://bbs.kanxue.com/thread-264220.htm
But I can't download because I don't have Chinese phone number.
Can anyone download for me and upload to other site no registration needed?

Deepl translate:
你好，我想在这个网站下载附件文件，用于解密DMM图书DRM。

https://bbs.kanxue.com/thread-264220.htm

但我不能下载，因为我没有中国的电话号码。

谁能帮我下载并上传到其他网站，不需要注册？
title: DMM DRM解密
